description.raw:
This is a unit test for the `Publisher` class.

We should review pull request #47 first. [Here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/branches/compare/publisher_test..publisher_class#diff) are the files changed.

CI results:

* [Drone](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/398) is happy.
* [Jenkins Ubuntu Trusty](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-trusty-amd64/24/) is happy.
* [Jenkins Homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/51/) is happy.
* [Jenkins Windows7-AMD64](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-windows7-amd64/32/) is happy (the code just compiles, tests don't run on Windows yet).
* [Jenkins Windows7-i386](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-windows7-i386/126/) is happy (the code just compiles, tests don't run on Windows yet).

This is a unit test for the Publisher class.
